title: PBST Model-Based Teaching Competency Enhancement Program for 21st-Century Science Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science education theory and digital tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: Course for aspiring science teachers working as corporate training managers/leaders, focusing on developing technology-integrated instructional design competencies

learning_goals: Systematically implement science learning design processes by applying the PBST model.
Evaluate 21st-century science lesson designs through the integration of TPACK elements (technology, pedagogy, content knowledge).
Develop project-based learning scenarios using digital tools and refine them by incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
